{"step_by_step_thinking": "Midostaurin is a multi-targeted kinase inhibitor that is used in the treatment of certain types of cancer. One of the mechanisms by which it works is by inhibiting angiogenesis, the process by which new blood vessels form from pre-existing vessels. This is crucial in cancer treatment as it prevents the tumor from receiving nutrients and oxygen, thereby inhibiting its growth.", "answer_choice": "A"}
